constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素的时间不超过给定的容量上限

constraints.name: value_difference
constraints.description: 选取元素的价值减去超出容量的部分，计算最终收益
constraints.formal: f_i - (t_i - S) if t_i > S, otherwise f_i

constraints.name: single_selection
constraints.description: 每次只能选择一个元素进行处理
constraints.formal: choose exactly one i in [1, N]
